description: Defines the Item data class which models a financial transaction (income or expense), including properties for id, date, category, title, and value; along with methods to derive the type (income or expense) based on a category.

classes.name: Item
classes.description: A data class representing a financial entry with properties for identification, date, category reference, title, and value; includes inner enum for item types and methods to determine type based on category.

methods.name: deriveType
methods.description: Determines whether the item is income or expense based on the provided Category object.

methods.name: isExpense
methods.description: Convenience method returning true if the item is an expense given its category.

methods.name: isIncome
methods.description: Convenience method returning true if the item is an income given its category.
